title: The Asset Allocator: Do Your Clients Respect You?
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Sales recruiter Jonathan Sack discusses how one commands respect, an issue of obvious relevance to financial advisors who must relate to clients and prospects. This podcast (5:42) argues that advisors’ knowledge and problem-solving ability counts most in earning respect, yet advisors never get to display what they know if they haven’t first demonstrated the mode of conduct that is socially required to succeed in business.  Learn more about your ad choices.
